alert.note: Alert for Hansford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 29 at 9:43PM CDT until July 31 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Texas... Palo Duro Creek at Spearman 6W affecting Hansford County. .Heavy rain has caused a significant rise on the Palo Duro Creek in Hansford County. For the Palo Duro Creek...including Spearman 6W...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Palo Duro Creek at Spearman 6W. * WHEN...From this evening to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Moderate overbank flooding occurs. Cattle are threatened and damage to fences is possible * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 4.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 945 AM CDT.
